Example of rfc1155 module usage 

>>> from pysnmp.proto import rfc1155
>>> s = rfc1155.ObjectSyntax()
>>> s
ObjectSyntax(simple=SimpleSyntax(empty=Null(None)))
>>> s['simple']['string'] = rfc1155.OctetString('foobar')
>>> s.encode()
'\004\006foobar'
>>>
>>> s2 = rfc1155.ObjectSyntax()
>>> s2
ObjectSyntax(simple=SimpleSyntax('empty'=Null(None)))
>>> s2.decode(s.encode())
''
>>> s2
ObjectSyntax(simple=SimpleSyntax(string=OctetString('foobar')))
>>>

ilya@glas.net
